name: novels
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool anime_manga_and_novels_api.
Tool description: Get the complete data of 14k Novels, 1k animes and 1k mangas.
we updated our data daily

API description: Fetches information about novels from the RapidAPI service.

pagesize.description: The number of items to return per page. Defaults to '2'.

page.description: The page number to retrieve. Defaults to '1'.
